Hydras:

"We shall plan it carefully my loyal Inferno, Come"said to all 
Preds"We have stuff to do in base"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Hydras:
> > 
> > "I COMMAND YOU NOT TELL ME QUEEN!!!!!"boomed Hydras"I need that 
you 
> > remain here coveren and watch Maximal base... I want to leave a 
> > trusted soldier to plant a device when times comes"Hydras 
handled a 
> > strange disc device"Remember, just when I command you... while 
> > remain cover, Maximals won't bother you"
> > 
> > And looking to Waspinator and Quicktrike said "Yess unlucky show 
> > it's over... and we have our own agenda to..." his little speach 
was 
> > interrupted when Vykos's message was picked and said "Normally 
I'll 
> > answer you when I like"said proudly Hydras"But what are you 
doing in 
> > this forgotten part of Universe?"
> > 
> "How shall I mask my presence?  The Maximals will surely grow
> suspicious if I were to remain next to their colony." Inferno asked
> while taking the device into his hands.
